title: What even can I say?
body:
Alright Fuckwits listen up.

What words can and can't be in leauge games.
Can a list be published so I know the boundaries between good and bad?

What I have gathered is that the words

-%%%got
-%%%%%%

are banned instantly if reported.

This leads me to believe that if i continously call people scum %%%% degenerate animals and virgins this will be ok and unbannable. There needs to be a clearly defined boundary..

Kind Regards, 
{{champion:53}}

replies.body: For reference those words are f-a-g-g-o-t and n-i-g-g-e-r

1. If you follow the motto "Don't be a Jerk", you'll pretty much never have any trouble.
2. Hate speech or suicide encouragement (e.g racism, sexism, "kys" etc) are classed as no tolerance language and are an instant 14-day suspension (skipping chat restriction tiers) or perma if you have already received 14-day.
3. There are two reasons Riot does not make a list.
 a. "Don't be a jerk" isn't hard to understand, and having a defined list/line just gives problematic players a means to skirt punishment because "this exact word/phrase I said wasn't on the list so I shouldn't be punished for calling them a [insert vaguely creative expletive here]".
 b. It's literally impossible. This post does a good job of explaining why: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/Ifb0rpEJ-riot-should-just-make-a-list-of-banned-words-and-how-not-to-be-condescending
